description: Manage RBAC role assignments for a Digital Twins instance.

commands.name: az dt role-assignment create
commands.summary: Assign a user, group or service principal to a role against a Digital Twins instance.
examples: az dt role-assignment create -n {instance_name} --assignee "owneruser@microsoft.com" --role "Azure Digital Twins Data Owner"
az dt role-assignment create -n {instance_name} --assignee "97a89267-0966-4054-a156-b7d86ef8e216" --role "Azure Digital Twins Data Reader"

commands.name: az dt role-assignment delete
commands.summary: Remove a user, group or service principal role assignment from a Digital Twins instance.
examples: az dt role-assignment delete -n {instance_name} --assignee "removeuser@microsoft.com" --role "Azure Digital Twins Data Reader"

commands.name: az dt role-assignment list
commands.summary: List the existing role assignments of a Digital Twins instance.
